Africa Tech Festival 2025

10 November 2025 – 13 November 2025

Informa Markets Cape Town, South Africa

Africa Tech Festival 2025

The new edition of the Africa Tech Festival puts African Tech on the Global Stage!

Uniting global technology and telecom leaders, entrepreneurs, and policymakers to drive digital transformation and innovation across Africa.

Africa Tech Festival provides a 360 view of how tech and strategy evolution is reshaping Africa’s diverse industry sectors – from telecoms, financial services, healthcare, government, SME and start-ups, retail, manufacture and beyond.

Expect world-class speakers, industry leading content, two international exhibitions, and outcome-driven networking focussed on how tech integration is delivering real-world impact through enterprise excellence and socioeconomic development.

For 27 years, we’ve been a forum for conversations, connections, and celebration exploring how innovation is addressing humanity’s most pressing challenges while elevating African tech onto the global stage.

AfricaCom 2025

The Home of Connectivity and Communications

The 27th Edition of AfricaCom returns to Cape Town this November for the largest gathering of Africa-focused connectivity leaders in the world.

Across 4 days, we connect the brightest minds in the telecoms space to share knowledge, build connections, inspire the greater telecommunications community to work towards accelerating Africa’s digital journey & put the spotlight on what a dynamic, ambitious and innovative region it is.

AfricaTech 2025

Meet our community of solvers

Today, a transformative mindset is essential for reinventing business models, with technology playing a pivotal role. Recent findings reveal that a significant number of African C-suite executives recognise technology as a key lever for transformation in the next few years. These insights underscore the strategic priority placed on technology by business leaders in the region, driving efficiency, innovation, and competitiveness.

We invite you to explore this new vision of technology at AfricaTech through real-life examples that combine the best of people and technology to bring sustainable solutions to the complex challenges of our times.

Secure your seat for game-changing tech talks that inspire your business, your team, Africa and beyond.

AfricaIgnite 2025

Empowering Start-Ups, Connecting Founders, Shaping Tomorrow

Building on the resounding success of its launch last year, AfricaIgnite returns as the flagship event for founders, investors, and key players in the tech ecosystem.

AfricaIgnite serves as the catalyst for driving positive change by supporting market access and investment opportunities for its burgeoning community of tech trailblazers.

With over 1,000 start-ups and 150+ investors in attendance last year, AfricaIgnite 2024 is solidifying itself as the leading hub for the community to convene, network and learn from leaders shaping the future of the industry.

AI Summit Cape Town 2025

THE AI SUMMIT SERIES LANDS IN CAPE TOWN FOR AFRICA TECH FESTIVAL!

The AI Summit Series, a global leader in AI events since 2016, is excited to announce the launch of The AI Summit Cape Town 2024. This flagship event joins the renowned Africa Tech Festival, solidifying Cape Town’s position as a hub for ground-breaking tech discussions.

Expect a dynamic programme featuring the biggest names and brightest minds in AI, all exploring how this transformative technology can create a brighter future for Africa.

Please note that access to The AI Summit Cape Town is exclusive to Platinum Pass holders.

  • 11-13 Nov: Expo & Content Sessions
  • 10-13 Nov: VIP & Partner Events

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
